name: aries
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a ram (= a male sheep with horns): He points out the Aries constellation.
[ C or U ] the first sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 21 March to 20 April, represented by a ram, or a person born during this period: My boyfriend is an Aries. Aries is a fire sign.
More examplesFewer examplesThe constellation of Aries is little more than a crooked line of three stars. They were studying a galaxy about 440 million light years away, in the direction of the constellation Aries.Western astrology has 12 signs or constellations from Aries to Pisces.
